text: Iurie Nicolaevici Bașcatov (20 June 1968 – 3 September 2022)Doliu în natația moldovenească. S-a stins din viață Iurii Bașcatov, dublul vicecampion olimpic was a Soviet and Moldovan freestyle swimmer. He competed at the 1988 and 1992 Summer Olympics, winning silver medals in both events.Башкатов Юрий. ussr- swimming.ru ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympians for Moldova Category:Soviet swimmers
title: Iurie Bașcatov
